Text: Legacy of Che Guevara:  Admired, sanctified, romanticized and derided, his crystallized status as either a brilliant intellectual or a violent ideologue is usually dependent on where one falls along the left and right of the political spectrum.
Triplets:<Legacy of Che Guevara
5:
--------------------
Text: Legacy of Che Guevara:  The debate around his legacy is further complicated by the fact that Guevara exists simultaneously as several different entities, both literal man and global emblem, leading to disputes between what people contend he did and what he now represents.
